item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260106)
item.description:
What's New

feat: add hotkey support for Convert Tool and paste from clipboard

  • Add configurable hotkey to open Convert Tool from anywhere
  • Add "Paste from clipboard" button next to input text header
  • Save hotkey immediately when changed via HotkeyRecorderView
  • Requires 2+ modifier keys (Cmd, Option, Ctrl, Shift)

Changes:

  • Preferences: add convertToolHotkey property
  • SharedSettings: add storage and notification for convert tool hotkey
  • EventTapManager: handle convert tool hotkey detection
  • AppDelegate: setup hotkey observer and open Convert Tool on trigger
  • ConvertToolSection: add hotkey recorder UI and paste button
  • ConvertToolViewModel: add pasteFromClipboard() function

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
